1.title: Beating Up New York

episode of.title: Prince Paul's Adventurous Musical Journey (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Legendary hip hop producer Prince Paul teams up with his friend Mr. Dead and Soce to explore the dance and DJ scene of NYC, with laughs and learning along the way.

2.title: Grease-Dripping Garage Fest

episode of.title: Prince Paul's Adventurous Musical Journey (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Prince Paul, Soce and Mr. Dead head out to Lawrence, Kansas to discover the latest with the Garage Music world. Strobe light raves, dance lessons, crowded basements, masks and more await our team.

3.title: New Orleans Bounce

episode of.title: Prince Paul's Adventurous Musical Journey (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: New Orleans is home to the hottest bounce music around. Prince Paul and crew get firsthand knowledge on banging beats, dance moves and the history of the genre, as well as how everything changed after Hurricane Katrina.

4.title: Face Melting Metal Fest

episode of.title: Prince Paul's Adventurous Musical Journey (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Paul, Soce and Dead fly out to Pomona, CA in order to see the finest metal musicians rock out. Mr. Dead makes some gruesome fake blood, but will he survive a massive stage dive?

5.title: Wet in the Desert Part 1

episode of.title: Prince Paul's Adventurous Musical Journey (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: The guys drive out to Palm Springs to interview DJs at an all-day party at the Ace Hotel. Soce has a blast in the swimming pool.

6.title: Wet in the Desert Part 2

episode of.title: Prince Paul's Adventurous Musical Journey (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: More interviews with premiere DJs at the Ace Hotel in Palm Springs. Prince Paul discusses how the series has increased his excitement in making music and promises more to come.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.title: Prince Paul's Adventurous Musical Journey
akas: Prince Paul's Adventurous Musical Journey (United States)
plot: Prince Paul travels all around the US with his two friends Soce and Mr. Dead, interviewing today's hottest music artists in a quest for inspiration.::Anonymous
